title: Incorporation of bean plants in soil with different agricultural practices

tasks.task: Attend and present a seminar on microbial populations in agricultural practices
subtasks: Thank the主持人 for the opportunity
Acknowledge the collaboration with CIMBESTAV and Luc Dendove
Review the long-term trials and research collaboration
Present the publication statistics and research impact
Discuss challenges with data analysis due to low replication
Explain the effects of agricultural practices on soil characteristics
Present carbon and nitrogen mineralization results
Describe microbial population changes with different treatments
Address criticisms of descriptive studies and ongoing research questions
Present techniques for extracting and analyzing RNA from soil
Discuss the role of bacteria in nutrient cycling under different treatments
Highlight specific case studies (e.g., El Batan, Obregon) and ongoing experiments
Conclude the seminar and open the floor for questions
Handle audience questions about soil sampling depth, biofertilizer efficacy, and RNA extraction challenges
Mention the value of long-term trials and collaborative research with partners.
